Believe me, I was SO ticked with the Negan finale too. Nevertheless, I continue to watch the show just for the sake that it was one of the first shows that got me interested in watching more TV shows, even if it has definitely been run into the ground.
You're so lucky to have those at a Barnes and Noble of all places! The closest I've seen is a Mercury Star pen at Hot Topic, and a Crystal-style Luna compact mirror at EB Games.

Depends on the show and situation. When done right, it can leave the viewers hanging in excitement and anticipation even after the episode ends. However, when you screw it up, it has potential to anger the viewers, ESPECIALLY if it's at the end of a season or leaves several loose ends as a result.
It's the perfect show to binge not-watch!
